setEventHandle

public void setEventHandle(java.lang.String handleName,
                           java.lang.String handle)
Sets Menu's event handle. Supported handle names are following:
  • onMouseOver
  • onMouseOut
Note: Menu doesn't allow to set onClick handle as it's reserved for Menu intenal use.
Overrides:
setEventHandle in class Component
